tasks.label: Build via PyInstaller & Run
tasks.detail: Build via PyInstaller under powershell (not recommended for distribution as it may include your personal configurations!)
tasks.command: Set-Location Minify; Remove-Item -Recurse 'dist'; uv run pyinstaller Minify.spec; Copy-Item 'bin' 'dist\Minify\bin' -Recurse; Copy-Item 'mods' 'dist\Minify\mods' -Recurse; Copy-Item '..\version' 'dist\Minify\version'; Copy-Item '..\readme.md' 'dist\Minify\readme.md'; Copy-Item '..\LICENSE' 'dist\Minify\LICENSE'; Copy-Item 'Source2Viewer-CLI.exe' 'dist\Minify'; dist\Minify\Minify.exe

tasks.label: Clean
tasks.detail: Clean build directories and logs under powershell
